alert.note: Alert for Sussex; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 26 at 3:30AM EDT until April 26 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex and Warren. In Pennsylvania, Carbon, Monroe and Northampton. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are beginning to approach their overnight minimums as clouds begin to move into the area. For the remainder of the overnight, temperatures may be nearly steady or rise some close to daybreak as clouds continue to increase.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
